description:
In this task, you can review any use case of the app. [Report the bugs(if any) or suggest the changes](https://github.com/openMF/mobile-wallet/issues) that you would like to make in the use case you're reviewing. 

The repository is at https://github.com/openMF/mobile-wallet.

Please find the attached latest build of MifosPay app. 

If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or email the corresponding mentors assigned to the task or you can message on [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/openMF/mobile-wallet) too.
name: Mifos Mobile Wallet - Review MifosPay App
